documents.content:
# California CSLB Contractor License Fees (2026)

## Contractors State License Board Fee Schedule

### Application Fees
| Fee Type | Amount |
|----------|--------|
| Original Application (1 classification) | $450 |
| Each Additional Classification | $150 |
| Initial License (Sole Owner) | $200 |
| Initial License (Non-Sole Owner) | $350 |
| Add Classification to Existing License | $230 |
| Replace Qualifier | $230 |
| Add Personnel | $125 |

### Fingerprinting (Required)
| Agency | Fee |
|--------|-----|
| DOJ Processing | $32 |
| FBI Processing | $17-$27 |
| **Total Fingerprinting** | **$49-$59** |

### Renewal Fees (Every 2 Years)
| License Type | Active Renewal | Delinquent Renewal |
|--------------|----------------|--------------------|
| Sole Owner | $450 | $675 |
| Non-Sole Owner | $700 | $1,050 |

### Bond Requirements
| Bond Type | Amount | Annual Cost (typical) |
|-----------|--------|-----------------------|
| Contractor License Bond | $25,000 | $100-$500 |
| Qualifying Individual Bond | $25,000 | $100-$500 |

*Bond costs depend on credit score and claims history*

### Processing Times (as of January 12, 2026)
| Unit | Currently Processing |
|------|---------------------|
| Original Applications | December 16, 2025 |
| Criminal Background | December 17, 2025 |
| Issuance | December 29, 2025 |
| Renewals | December 29, 2025 |
| Bonds | December 19-23, 2025 |

### Official URLs
- Fee Schedule: https://www.cslb.ca.gov/
- Processing Times: https://www2.cslb.ca.gov/onlineservices/processingtimes/processingtimes.aspx
- Application Status: https://www2.cslb.ca.gov/OnlineServices/CheckApplicationII/ApplicantRequest.aspx
